title: After Unusual Route to Flyers, Dave Hakstol Plots a Radical Ascent
text:
Published By: NYTimes Hockey - Today 
Dave Hakstol, whom Philadelphia hired as head coach directly from the University of North Dakota, said he would get the team, long known for... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
